isocline.reflow

Interface Plan

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PlanImpl

    public interface Plan
    Plan class for process flow. It is responsible for planning the processing time, such as setting the start time and ending time for method execution or process flow execution.

      • finishTime

        Plan finishTime(String isoDateTime)
         throws ParseException
        Set the finish time at which the Plan should quit repeating (and be automatically deleted).
        Parameters:
        isoDateTime - this date-time as a String, such as 2019-06-16T10:15:30Z or 2019-06-16T10:15:30+01:00[Europe/Paris].
        Returns:
        an instance of Plan
        Throws:
        ParseException
